about_the_game:
year 2123. The earth is filled with corrosive gases, the atmosphere is spoiled. Humans have created habitable conditions on the moon. To become an inhabitant of the New Earth (not everyone can do this), you need to pass tests, a number of quests.
New Earth: The Quest is a single-player game developed by one person using ready-made assets. In this game there are 4 levels, 4 quests that you have to go through in order to become a resident of New Earth.
The addictive gameplay will not leave anyone indifferent, the quest with horror elements at some levels keeps you in suspense, but at the end you relax realizing that this is a simulation.

name: New Earth: The Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4 core 3 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Nvidia GeForce GTX 750+ series and similar (2 GB)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7 10750H and similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 and similar
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
